snippet: Scott Lowe and his wife, Rio Miura, who run a beverage company, try to cope without a dedicated, six-figure information-technology specialist.
abstract: Scott Lowe and his wife, Rio Miura, who run a beverage company, try to cope without a dedicated, six-figure information-technology specialist.

headline.main: Tech Audit: Two Owners, Two Companies, Lots of I.T. Headaches
